comments: She is a wonderful professor. I love her. she worked hard with us. she all helped all the time and encourage everyone to work harder.

Shes really nice and wants to help her students as much as possible. Her exams are ok. She wants her students to understand chemistry. Most people dont understand her but if you dont, than just drop the class. Read the textbook, do as many problems as you can and you should be fine.

STAY AWAY FROM THIS PROFESSOR!!! seh does not help, will not curve grades, and does not post any lectures up ! not only that but she barely speaks english and is impossible to understand . STAY AWAY if you care about your gpa.
Shes the best really wants to help!! just show up for class!!! I love her!!! she rockssssssss!!!!
if you speak english drop this class. I sat in a few classes and when i figured that i will never understand her, i switch for a different professor

She is an okay teacher. She tries to help her students as much as she can, if you need help talk to her. I mostly taught myself in that class and at the end I received an A. I would recommend her she is not a hard teacher and an easy grader.

I took this proff. for GenChem/Orgo. I only went to four classes (three were exam days), but i hear she preferences those who attend class. I got a 68, 84, 64 on my exams, and I think a 70 on the final. I ended up getting a B in the class, pretty nice curve. She gives extra questions/lets you show work for credit also. I\'d say take her over brown.

Orgo is what you put into it. I don\'t think that the professor makes a difference. language barrier is tough so plan on learning a lot on your own. Tests are ok. Listen to what she says the lecture before the test. She appreciates in-class particiaption and seeing you often. This may help your grade in the end. However she does not take attendance

Dont listen to these ppl.... she wants everyone to do good. she curves all tests...someone who got 9/28 questions right on the test got a 90 for showing work. participate, make sure she knows ur name.
Speaks her own language. Very poor english. SHE WILL CONFUSE YOU! Her tests are usually based of of Browns exams. HORRIBLE TEACHER. DOESNT KNOW WHAT SHE IS TALKIN ABOUT
Recitation wont help! She just freaks out alot.. ALOT .. ask her for take home tests shell do it or just avoid it

Totally useless. Doesn\'t explain anything to you. The information she tells you is inaccurate half the time. Enjoys playing tricks on you, resulting in lower quiz grades. Avoid her recitation, it will NOT help you at all.
